articles.description: The cigar-shaped asteroid is 10 times longer than it is wide and was probably flung from a young stellar system, location unknown.
articles.content: In October, scientists using the University of Hawaii's Pan-STARRS 1 telescope sighted something extraordinary: Earth's first confirmed interstellar visitor. Originally called A/2017 U1, the once-mysterious object has a new name'Oumuamua, according toScientif… [+2978 chars]

articles.title: You Can Now Book a Stay at the World's First Space Hotel - Mental Floss
articles.description: A 12-day trip will cost $9.5 million per person, and reservations for the first four months have already sold out.
articles.content:
Looking for an exotic vacation destination with stellar views? If you're willing to wait a few years, you may be able to stay aboard the Aurora Station, a luxury space hotel that developer Orion Span plans to have open to guests by 2022.

articles.description: Don't panic—the U.S. government has a plan for doomsday.
